title: Create Deployment Plan
description: Plan your deployment strategy, monitoring, and launch operations
instructions:
Create a comprehensive deployment and launch plan:

1. Pre-Launch Checklist:
   - Code quality checks (tests, linting, type-checking)
   - AI configuration (rate limiting, error handling, cost limits)
   - Performance benchmarks (latency targets)
   - Security validation (auth, input validation)
   - Monitoring setup (Sentry, analytics)

2. Deployment Strategy:
   - Choose strategy based on risk tolerance
   - Document rollout steps

3. Monitoring Setup:
   - Error tracking tool (Sentry)
   - LLM metrics to track (tokens, cost, latency)
   - Uptime monitoring (UptimeRobot)
   - Alert thresholds

4. Launch Plan:
   - Timeline (T-24h, T-1h, launch, T+1h, T+24h)
   - Launch channels (Product Hunt, Twitter, etc.)
   - Content prepared (posts, demo video)

5. Rollback Procedure:
   - When to rollback
   - Step-by-step rollback process

6. Post-Launch:
   - Week 1 priorities (fix bugs, optimize costs)
   - Optimization strategies

testCases.description: Has at least 3 code quality checks
Has at least 3 AI configuration checks
Has at least 3 LLM metrics to track

hints: Pre-launch checklist should cover technical readiness (tests passing, env vars set)
Choose deployment strategy based on user base size and risk
Monitor LLM-specific metrics: tokens, cost, latency, quality
Launch on multiple channels for maximum reach (Product Hunt, Twitter, HN)
Have clear rollback procedure ready before launch
Week 1 priorities: fix critical bugs, optimize costs, gather feedback
